tripleplay.ui.TextWidget

    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of TextWidget in tripleplay.ui

      Classes in tripleplay.ui with type parameters of type TextWidget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TextWidget<T extends TextWidget<T>>
      An abstract base class for widgets that contain text.
      Subclasses of TextWidget in tripleplay.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTextButton<T extends AbstractTextButton<T>>
      An abstract base class for buttons with text labels.
      class  Button
      A button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
      class  CheckBox
      Displays a checkbox which can be toggled.
      class  Field
      Displays text which can be edited via the Input.getText(playn.core.Keyboard.TextType, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) popup.
      static class  HistoryGroup.RenderableLabel
      A label that exposes the width hint and preferred size.
      class  Label
      A widget that displays one or more lines of text and/or an icon image.
      class  LongPressButton
      A button that supports an action on a "long press".
      class  MenuItem
      An item in a menu.

      A toggle button that displays text, or an icon, or both.
      class  ValueLabel
      Deprecated. 
      Use Label.Label(ValueView).
